    • Method Detail

      • forwardRequest

        public static boolean forwardRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest sourceRequest,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                              throws DgException,
                                     java.io.IOException,
                                     javax.servlet.ServletException
        Rewrites the current URL to "normal" form and forward to it, if it is needed.
        Parameters:
        sourceRequest - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        Returns:
        true, if URL was rewritten and forward was performed. Otherwise - false.
        Throws:
        DgException - on excaption
        java.io.IOException - on excaption
        javax.servlet.ServletException - on excaption
